sentences: Olen selles küsimuses nädal aega töötanud.
Kui sa tahad, et me kohtume kell viis tundi õhtul.
See on esimene kord, et ma olen siin nädal tundi.
context: The Estonian word 'tund' has multiple meanings. It can mean 'hour' (as in time measurement), a 'time period', or it can refer to feelings/senses like 'feeling' or 'sense'. For example, when referring to time: kell viis tundi = 5 o'clock; nädal aega = for a week's time. When referring to feelings: mul on hea tund = I have a good feeling.
